content.raw:
* I checked the code this is much nicer than what I had and works just fine. Also from reading the code there should be no one off error I think. (Update: I'll test this some more)
* Mh under PyQt5 this is not the case. I'll test under PyQt4 and remove the line of code that resizes the columns afterwards and we will need to clean up the ui in the future. (Update: Both PyQt4 and PyQt5 show the color boxes just fine on mac but I'll remove the resize line anyway)
* Yup, I forgot to remove that code moved it to a new function now.
